text: Diabetes: symptoms mein frequent urination, excessive thirst, unexplained weight loss aa sakta hai.
Hypertension (BP): salt kam, regular exercise, weight control, stress management helpful hota hai.
Cholesterol: LDL kam rakhne ke liye high-fiber diet, trans-fats avoid, aur regular walks karna faydemand hai.
Thyroid (hypo): fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance common - TSH test doctor se karwana chahiye.
Fever care: hydration, rest, light diet; red flags: persistent high fever, breathing issues, confusion.
